employees.name: Hobo Jack
employees.job: Doesn't actually work here, just hangs out here.

products.name: Red Velvet
products.description: Red velvet cake is traditionally a red, red-brown, crimson or scarlet-colored chocolate layer cake, layered with ermine icing.

products.name: Mango Creme Brulee
products.description: Vanilla sponge cake layered with vanilla brulee and mango mousse. Decorated with fresh mango, strawberries, chocolate, and mango cream.

products.name: Multigrain
products.description: Multigrain bread is a type of bread prepared with two or more types of grain. Grains used include barley, flax, millet, oats, wheat, and whole-wheat flour, among others.

products.name: French Garlic Cheese
products.description: French bread, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, garlic, olive oil.

products.name: Hazelnut Latte
products.description: Delicious homemade hazelnut milk flavored with maple, cinnamon, nutmeg & vanilla is perfect with coffee or espresso!

products.name: Caramel Macchiato
products.description: Freshly steamed milk with vanilla-flavored syrup marked with espresso and topped with a caramel drizzle for an oh-so-sweet finish.

products.name: New York Bagel
products.description: A bread product originating in Poland, traditionally shaped by hand into the form of a ring from yeasted wheat dough, roughly hand-sized, which is first boiled for a short time in water and then baked.

products.name: Viennese Whirls
products.description: A soft shortbread biscuit, commonly filled with buttercream and jam

products.name: Caramel Shortbread
products.description: A biscuit confectionery item composed of a rectangular shortbread biscuit base topped with a very soft caramel filling and a milk chocolate topping.

products.name: Countess
products.description: Small, slightly sweet shortbread that is typical of Guianan cuisine, the cuisine of French Guiana.

products.name: Ghoriba
products.description: A round, shortbread cookie prepared in the Maghreb and other parts of the Middle East.

products.name: Kourabiedes
products.description: Greek shortbread.

products.name: Blueberry Muffin
products.description: An individual-sized, baked quick bread product with fresh blueberries.

products.name: Curry Bread
products.description: Some Japanese curry is wrapped in a piece of dough, which is coated in flaky bread crumbs, and usually deep fried or baked.

products.name: Tea
products.description: Green, white, oolong, earl grey, matcha, chai, etc.

products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: A cappuccino is an espresso-based coffee drink that originated in Italy, and is traditionally prepared with steamed milk foam.

products.name: Carrot Cake
products.description: Moist, dense, sweet cake made with carrots.

products.name: Tiramisu
products.description: A coffee-flavoured Italian dessert. It is made of ladyfingers (savoiardi) dipped in coffee, layered with a whipped mixture of eggs, sugar and mascarpone cheese, flavoured with cocoa.

products.name: Tres Leches
products.description: A sponge cake—in some recipes, a butter cake—soaked in three kinds of milk: evaporated milk, condensed milk, and heavy cream.

products.name: Mille-feuille
products.description: Three layers of puff pastry alternating with two layers of pastry cream. The top is glazed in white (icing) and brown (chocolate) strips, and combed into a distinctive pattern.
